name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an adversary executed unauthorized scripts to enumerate internal resources and exfiltrate data.

action--a9e539a4-88b0-4ecf-bf9f-6ffab67b.name: Terminate malicious PowerShell process
action--a9e539a4-88b0-4ecf-bf9f-6ffab67b.description: Kill the PowerShell process executing unauthorized scripts.

action--3127acee-575c-4dcb-8c43-8722c82e.name: Restrict PowerShell execution policy
action--3127acee-575c-4dcb-8c43-8722c82e.description: Set the execution policy to restricted to prevent unauthorized script execution.

if-condition--210a4bd7-1ddd-4fab-912b-b0.name: Check for confirmed compromise
if-condition--210a4bd7-1ddd-4fab-912b-b0.description: Determine if compromise is confirmed based on incident details.

action--210a4bd7-1ddd-4fab-912b-b09c6b1a.name: Change compromised user credentials
action--210a4bd7-1ddd-4fab-912b-b09c6b1a.description: Change the password for the compromised user account.

action--9ce3677a-a5a9-41c7-9aeb-0ffab9a9.name: Monitor and block suspicious outbound traffic
action--9ce3677a-a5a9-41c7-9aeb-0ffab9a9.description: Block any suspicious outbound traffic to prevent further data exfiltration.

loop--1edf9d54-b379-44e5-af9e-91c8b465d7.name: Run antivirus scan until clean
loop--1edf9d54-b379-44e5-af9e-91c8b465d7.description: Run a full antivirus scan and repeat until the system is confirmed clean.

action--1edf9d54-b379-44e5-af9e-91c8b465.name: Run full antivirus scan
action--1edf9d54-b379-44e5-af9e-91c8b465.description: Perform a full scan of the system.

if-condition--4b8c55a2-b1ae-4519-b0ac-6e.name: Check if firewall is disabled
if-condition--4b8c55a2-b1ae-4519-b0ac-6e.description: Ensure that the firewall is enabled to protect the system.

commands.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on

set-scan-result--ef02c592-dc38-4607-8bdf.name: Set scan result
set-scan-result--ef02c592-dc38-4607-8bdf.description: Set the scan result from antivirus scan output.
